80701. Conversion of Palembang

Palembang — Not random

Conditions

  • None of the following must occur:
    • State religion is sunni
    • State religion is eastern_sunni

Will happen within 2000 days of January 2, 1500
Checked again every 2000 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1819)

Description

Palembang became Muslim during the turn of the 16th century, forcing out the Buddhist nobility, the Priyayi.

Actions

A. The Sultans shall rule

  • Change religion to eastern_sunni
  • Monarch The Sultans becomes active
  • Religion in the capital province changes to sunni

B. The Priyayi shall rule

  • Stability +1

Back to top

80708. The End of the Majapahit Empire

Palembang — Not random

Conditions

  • Palembang is a vassal of Mataram

Triggered by

Action A of 234000 - The End of the Majapahit Empire for Mataram

Description

The Majapahit Empire is dead. We owe their successors nothing.

Actions

A. We shall rule ourselves

  • Break vassalization with Mataram
